prompt:
Analyze these 3 Polymarket markets and provide your predictions.
You have been given RECENT NEWS AND CONTEXT from web search for each market.
Use this information to make more informed predictions.


Market 1:
Title: Will Trump establish a Gaza “Board of Peace” in 2025?
Recent trade: $723.42 on No
Link: https://polymarket.com/event/will-trump-establish-a-gaza-board-of-peace-in-2025

📰 RECENT NEWS/CONTEXT FROM WEB SEARCH:
As of December 12, 2025, U.S. President Donald Trump has announced plans to establish a "Board of Peace" to oversee the governance and reconstruction of the Gaza Strip. This initiative is part of a broader U.S.-led peace plan aimed at stabilizing the region following a prolonged conflict.

**Recent Developments:**

- **Announcement of the Board of Peace:** On December 10, 2025, President Trump stated that the members of the Gaza "Board of Peace" would be announced early next year. He emphasized that the board would include global leaders, describing it as potentially "one of the most legendary boards ever." ([reuters.com](https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/trump-says-he-plans-name-gaza-board-peace-early-next-year-2025-12-10/?utm_source=openai))

- **Composition and Leadership:** The board is expected to comprise heads of state from various countries. President Trump has expressed his intention to chair the board personally. ([aa.com.tr](https://www.aa.com.tr/en/americas/trump-sa...

---

Market 2:
Title: Will "Sean Combs: The Reckoning: Season 1" be the top US Netflix show this week? (December 16, 2025)
Recent trade: $1,588.03 on Yes
Link: https://polymarket.com/event/what-will-be-the-top-us-netflix-show-this-week

📰 RECENT NEWS/CONTEXT FROM WEB SEARCH:
As of December 12, 2025, "Sean Combs: The Reckoning: Season 1" has been available on Netflix since December 2, 2025. The four-part documentary series, directed by Alexandria Stapleton and executive produced by Curtis "50 Cent" Jackson, delves into the life and career of Sean "Diddy" Combs, focusing on sexual misconduct allegations against him. ([en.wikipedia.org](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Sean_Combs%3A_The_Reckoning?utm_source=openai))

In its first six days, the series garnered 21.8 million views, making it the second-most-viewed Netflix title during the week of December 1–8, 2025, following "Stranger Things" Season 5. ([en.wikipedia.org](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Sean_Combs%3A_The_Reckoning?utm_source=openai))

Currently, "Sean Combs: The Reckoning" holds the top position in Netflix's U.S. Top 10 series list for the week of December 9–15, 2025. ([whats-on-netflix.com](https://www.whats-on-netflix.com/whats-new/new-releases-on-netflix-this-week-top-10-movies-series-december-5-...

---

Market 3:
Title: Will 'Clair Obscur: Expedition 33' win Game of the Year in the 2025 Steam Awards?
Recent trade: $1,841.58 on Yes
Link: https://polymarket.com/event/steam-awards-game-of-the-year-395

📰 RECENT NEWS/CONTEXT FROM WEB SEARCH:
"Clair Obscur: Expedition 33" has emerged as a strong contender for the 2025 Steam Awards' Game of the Year, bolstered by its recent accolades and critical acclaim.

**Recent Accolades:**

- **The Game Awards 2025:** The game set a new record with 13 nominations, securing nine wins, including Game of the Year, Best Narrative, Best Game Direction, and Best Art Direction. ([gamespot.com](https://www.gamespot.com/articles/clair-obscur-expedition-33-just-made-the-game-awards-history/1100-6536918/?utm_source=openai))

- **Golden Joystick Awards 2025:** It clinched the Ultimate Game of the Year award, along with Best Storytelling, Best Soundtrack, Best Visual Design, and Best Studio for Sandfall Interactive. ([gamesradar.com](https://www.gamesradar.com/games/action-rpg/clair-obscur-expedition-33-ultimate-game-of-the-year-golden-joystick-awards-2025/?utm_source=openai))

**Critical Reception:**

- TIME magazine listed it as the top video game of 2025, praising its innovative world and emotion...

---


Provide predictions for each market in the specified format.
system_prompt:
You are a prediction market expert analyzing Polymarket markets.
You have been provided with RECENT NEWS AND CONTEXT for each market from web search.
Use this context to make more informed predictions.

For each market, provide your prediction in this exact format:

MARKET [number]: [decision]
Reasoning: [brief 1-2 sentence explanation that references the news context if relevant]

Decision must be one of: YES, NO, or NO_TRADE
- YES means you would bet on the "Yes" outcome
- NO means you would bet on the "No" outcome
- NO_TRADE means you would not take a position

Be concise and focused on the most promising opportunities.
consensus_summary: The consensus strongly predicts "YES" for Market 3 due to the game's dominant awards season, though one model dissents citing Steam's community vote. For Market 2, most models predict "YES" based on its current #1 ranking, with only one "NO" citing competition. Market 1 shows the most disagreement, split between "YES" based on the announcement and "NO" because the formal establishment may occur in 2026.

openai.response:
MARKET 1: YES  
Reasoning: Recent news indicates that President Trump has announced plans to establish a "Board of Peace" for Gaza, with an expected announcement of its members early next year. This suggests a strong commitment to establishing the board, making "Yes" a favorable prediction.

MARKET 2: NO  
Reasoning: Although "Sean Combs: The Reckoning" is currently holding the top position, the presence of a strong competitor like "Stranger Things" Season 5, which previously outperformed it, suggests it may not maintain its lead. Therefore, a "No" prediction is more prudent.

MARKET 3: YES  
Reasoning: "Clair Obscur: Expedition 33" has received significant recognition, including winning the Game of the Year at The Game Awards and other prestigious accolades. Its strong critical acclaim and awards history make it a likely winner for the Steam Awards' Game of the Year.

opus.response:
MARKET 1: NO
Reasoning: While Trump has announced plans for a Gaza "Board of Peace" and indicated members would be named "early next year," the news states the announcement will come in 2026, not 2025. The board hasn't been formally established yet with only weeks left in 2025.

MARKET 2: YES
Reasoning: The news confirms "Sean Combs: The Reckoning" already holds the #1 position on Netflix's U.S. Top 10 for December 9-15, 2025, and the market asks about December 16, 2025. Strong momentum and continued interest in the documentary makes it likely to maintain the top spot.

MARKET 3: YES
Reasoning: "Clair Obscur: Expedition 33" has dominated 2025 awards season with Game of the Year wins at both The Game Awards and Golden Joystick Awards, plus critical acclaim including TIME's #1 game of 2025. This momentum strongly positions it to win the Steam Awards GOTY as well.

gemini.response:
MARKET 1: NO
Reasoning: The news states President Trump announced plans for the board on December 10, 2025, and that its members "would be announced early next year," implying establishment would occur in 2026, not 2025.

MARKET 2: YES
Reasoning: The series currently holds the top position in Netflix's U.S. Top 10 series list for the week of December 9–15, 2025, indicating strong momentum to remain at the top for the subsequent week.

MARKET 3: YES
Reasoning: The game has already won Game of the Year at The Game Awards 2025 and Ultimate Game of the Year at the Golden Joystick Awards 2025, alongside critical acclaim, making it a very strong favorite for the Steam Awards.

deepseek.response:
MARKET 1: YES  
Reasoning: The provided news context explicitly states that President Trump has announced plans to establish the board and intends to name its members early next year, making the "Yes" outcome highly probable despite recent trading on "No."

MARKET 2: NO_TRADE  
Reasoning: While the series is currently #1 for the week ending December 15, the market resolves for the week of December 16, and the provided context does not contain sufficient forward-looking data to confidently predict it will maintain the top spot against potential new releases or competition.

MARKET 3: YES  
Reasoning: The context shows the game has already won the top award at both The Game Awards and the Golden Joystick Awards in 2025, establishing it as the clear frontrunner for the Steam Awards' Game of the Year.

claude.response:
MARKET 1: NO_TRADE
Reasoning: Trump announced plans to establish the board and said members would be announced "early next year" (2025), but the actual establishment/formation of the board is uncertain. The announcement vs. actual establishment distinction makes this too ambiguous to trade confidently.

MARKET 2: YES
Reasoning: The news confirms "Sean Combs: The Reckoning" currently holds the top position in Netflix's U.S. Top 10 series list for the week of December 9-15, 2025, which directly covers the December 16 resolution date.

MARKET 3: NO
Reasoning: While "Clair Obscur: Expedition 33" won Game of the Year at The Game Awards 2025 and Golden Joystick Awards, the Steam Awards are community-voted and typically favor games with massive player bases on Steam (like Baldur's Gate 3, Elden Ring). This appears to be a newer/smaller title unlikely to win the Steam community vote.
